newsitem.title: USA: FSA announces secondary market insurance.
newsitem.headline: FSA announces secondary market insurance.

text.p: Financial Security Assurance said Monday it has secondary market insurance capacity for Puerto Rico Highway Authority.
Insurance is available on maturities 2004 and longer. There is no par limit per firm.
FSA said it also has remaining secondary insurance capacity for:
--California State Public Works Board, Lease Revenue (Department of Correction only)
Insurance is available on maturities 2004 on longer. There is no par limit per firm.
For futher details, please contact Tom Byrne, Greg Haggerty, or Alan Steinfeld at 212-826-0601.
